implements java.io.Serializable

      public void setHero​(boolean b)
      allows toggle between two available heroines, used with GUI creates Hero objects of sub-classes with their listeners
      Parameters:
      b - boolean for method setHeroine in Game if true Hero is BlueFairy else FatFairy
      See Also:
      Hero, Game, IsOnPlatform, Munch, DeathComesTooSoon
